OCD.name: Generic Geocoder
OCD.description: Geocodes place names to geographic coordinates (latitudes and longitudes)

AD.name: Place Type
AD.description: Select the type of place, State or Country

AD.name: Place Name Column
AD.description: Find longitudes and latitudes for the place names in this column

OCD.name: Yahoo! Geocoder
OCD.description: Geocodes place names to geographic coordinates (latitudes and longitudes) using Yahoo. Ensure your machine is connected to the Internet. If you need to geocode more than a few entities, you may wish to obtain a Yahoo Place Finder application ID from http://developer.yahoo.com/geo/placefinder/ . You may otherwise leave this field blank. Each ID is limited to 50,000 requests per day. Performance may vary due to network latency; expect about 500 unique requests per minute.

AD.name: Yahoo Application ID
AD.description: Please obtain a Yahoo Place Finder application ID from \nhttp://developer.yahoo.com/geo/placefinder/

AD.name: Place Type
AD.description: Select the type of place: State, Country, Zip Code or Address

AD.name: Place Name Column
AD.description: Find longitudes and latitudes for the place names in this column

AD.name: Include address details
AD.description: Include additional address details from Yahoo! such as county, ZIP code, city, etc.

OCD.name: Bing Geocoder
OCD.description: Geocodes place names to geographic coordinates (latitudes and longitudes) using Bing. Ensure your machine is connected to the Internet. Each App Key is limited to 50,000 requests per day. Performance may vary due to network latency;

AD.name: Bing App key
AD.description: Please obtain a Bing maps key from \nhttp://www.microsoft.com/maps/

AD.name: Place Type
AD.description: Select the type of place: State, Country, Zip Code or Address

AD.name: Place Name Column
AD.description: Find longitudes and latitudes for the place names in this column

AD.name: Include address details
AD.description: Include additional address details from Bing such as county, ZIP code, city, etc.
